Hotel Names: InterContinental Cairo Semiramis, an IHG Hotel
location: Corniche El Nil, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: On the historic Semiramis hotel site, guests can enjoy modern luxury by the river Nile. Semiramis InterContinental Cairo is 23 KM from Cairo International airport with a premium location in the heart of the city center next to the Egyptian Museum and Khan el Khalili.The Hotel features a 26 sq m2 rooftop pool, fine dining with exquisite cuisine, conference facilities, a state of the art spa, a shopping arcade, and the Nile Terrace offering stunning views of the sunset over the Nile.

location: 2 Kasr El Nile St Tahrir Square, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Among Cairo hotels, Steigenberger El Tahrir secures a spectacular location in El Tahrir Square, overlooking the Egyptian museum, minutes away from Khan El Khalili Bazar, and in close proximity to Egypt's major attractions with a total area of 21,633 sqm. The hotel boasts 295 guest rooms and suites with luxurious decoration items and in-room amenities. This landmark hotel is an ideal location for business trips and social events, offering a variety of culinary outlets, a swimming pool, gym and banqueting facilities.

Hotel Names: 2. Kempinski Nile Hotel Garden City Cairo
location: 12 Ahmed Ragheb Street Garden City, Cairo 11519 Egypt
Description: Situated in Cairo’s affluent Garden City district, Kempinski Nile Hotel offers luxurious rooms on the shores of the Nile RiverEach room is fitted with free Wi-Fi, free Minibar, Flat Screen TVs with satellite Channels, Free Movie Library, 24/7 Butler Service, Complimentary Tea and Coffee throughout the day. Kempinski’s full-service spa and wellness center offers Free access to Jacuzzi, steam room, and sauna.. Guests can also enjoy professional massages, or cool off in the outdoor swimming pool on the hotel’s rooftop.The hotel is few minutes walk from luxurious shopping areas, Tahrir square, Egyptian Museum, Opera House.

location: Dr Abd Al Aziz Al Shennawy St, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: You are invited to escape the noise and the pollution and to enjoy the peaceful atmosphere on Al Masa spectacular heights. While sitting under a pergola surrounded by the stunning nature enjoy beverage of choice that are served to match the moment. It is the spot for a quiet, contemplative moment where you can enjoy the tranquility of the environment. In a one-of-a-kind experience, imagine your self-hiking along one of the most beautiful ridge walks in the green foothills. Al Masa Hotel features a terrace with a swimming pool. In the green area of Nasr City, it includes 5 restaurants and a spa center. All the elegant rooms have a balcony. Al Masa Hotel has a selection of activities, including different types of massages, Billiards, cinema and bowling. Cairo International Airport is a 10-minute drive and Cairo International Conference Centre is just a 5-minute drive away. The center of Cairo and the Egyptian Museum are both 20 minutes away by car.

Hotel Names: 4. Cairo Marriott Hotel & Omar Khayyam Casino
location: 16 Saray El Gezira Street Zamalek, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Among premier Cairo, Egypt hotels, Cairo Marriott Hotel & Omar Khayyam Casino sits in the Zamalek area and is the perfect destination for weekend getaways, vacations, and business travel. The twin towers of this landmark hotel in Cairo rise 20 stories high and provide magnificent views of the Nile and six acres of palace gardens.

location: Cairo International Airport Road El Horreya-Heliopolis, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Le Passage Cairo Hotel & Casino is located in Heliopolis, an elegant business and residential district in Cairo and it is considered one of the safest area in town. The hotel is only five minutes from Cairo International Airport and ten minutes from the Cairo International Convention Centre and Fair Grounds, with free shuttle bus service, free wifi and free internet. Great design is the key to this urban, cosmopolitan business and leisure base, providing a sophisticated and stylish environment in the throbbing heart of Egypt and the Middle East. Le Passage Cairo Hotel & Casino celebrates individuality with a wide range of accommodation choices from well appointed rooms and suites with exquisite views to the Executive Club floor which is ideal for business travelers, short breaks, family holidays or those special occasions.

Hotel Names: Staybridge Suites Cairo - Citystars, an IHG Hotel
location: Emtedad Makram Obied Street Heliopolis, Cairo 11737 Egypt
Description: Modern serviced apartments for extended stays in dynamic Cairo Citystars.Offering the comfort and convenience of a home away from home, Staybridge Suites® Cairo Citystars has everything you need for independent living in the exciting commercial hub of Heliopolis. With direct access to Stars Centre shopping mall, and just a seven-minute drive from Cairo International Airport and Cairo International Convention and Exhibition Centre, our 140 fully furnished studios and suites place travelers where they need to be. The buzzing streets of downtown Cairo are half an hour away, with the Great Pyramids a little further.Business travelers on extended stays in Cairo can settle into a spacious studio or suite with up to three bedrooms. Full kitchens and living areas let you cook, work and entertain in style, and Wi-Fi is complimentary throughout. A free buffet breakfast sets you up for the day, and an Evening Social invites you to mingle with fellow guests over dinner three nights a week.

location: 3 El Tayaran Street Nasr City, Cairo 9039 Egypt
Description: The Sonesta Cairo's 409 spacious guest rooms and suites offer a variety of luxurious amenities. A room on the executive floors offer exclusive lounges and 24-hour concierge service. The poolside bar and full-service spa with a Turkish steam bath are heavens for relaxation. After the pampering, the hotel offers several options at its gourmet restaurants serving Italian, Lebanese, Japanese, or French cuisine. One of the best Cairo hotels, the Sonesta is ideal for both business and leisure travellers. ** As per the Ministry of Health and Ministry of Tourism's recent rules and regulations; Non-Egyptian guests are required to provide to the hotel a proof of a negative PCR test for (COVID-19) issued not more than 72 hours prior to arrival (starting 15 August, 2020)

location: 3 El Thawra Council St Zamalek, Cairo Egypt
Description: On the southern tip of Gezirah Island, the hotel is a corner of paradise in central Cairo, minutes from Cairo’s business districts. Discover a haven of peace during a vacation in Egypt, and a comfortable base to rest after a successful day of business. Relax by the pool, pamper yourself in Sofitel SPA, wine and dine in our international restaurants and bars. Surrender to luxury and come for a day, a weekend, a week…or more. A stroll along the hotel’s lush riverside promenade takes you to a host of acclaimed restaurants and bars. You can take your time, enjoying the cool shade of exotic palms and breathing in the scent of hibiscus. You’ll hear the gentle sound of water lapping as you rest on a Nile-side terrace with a cool drink, and dine on international cuisine. It’s especially beautiful at dusk, when the sun sets over Cairo’s skyline and vibrant nightlife. Escape the city for a day at our secluded Cairo hotel, which feels like an exclusive Egyptian resort set in lush gardens. Take advantage of Sofitel SPA and Sofitel FIT, float in an infinity pool overlooking the Nile, unwind in a bubbling whirlpool bath… whatever you desire. Day membership includes discounts to the restaurants and bars which line the Nile-side promenade, promising refreshment and fun for families, couples and friends.

location: Abdel Hamid Badawi Street Extension Heliopolis Area, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Superbly located in Heliopolis, The new Radisson Blu Hotel, Cairo Heliopolis is the hotel of choice for business travelers and tourists. Providing spacious, well appointed guest rooms. The hotel is the perfect oasis for guest visiting the city. Flexible meeting rooms and a day-lit ballroom make the hotel one of the area's premiere conference venues. After a hard day’s work, or following a visit to Cairo sights guests can relax and unwind in the Egyptian sun at the hotel’s rooftop pool and elegant spa area.

location: El Tesseen Street City Centre, Fifth Settlement, New Cairo, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: An oasis of greenery in the heart of New Cairo, Dusit Thani Lake View Cairo brings a taste of gracious Thai hospitality to the center of Egypt. Conveniently situated near Cairo International airport, the hotel enjoys pride of place in New Cairo’s Fifth Settlement in close proximity to the main roads that lead to major attractions, including the Pyramids, Sphinx, Citadel and Egyptian Museum. Guests are welcomed with elegant rooms and suites, three outdoor swimming pools, a fitness center, world-class spa and an array of fine dining options spanning a world of tastes and flavours.

location: First Settlement, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Let us welcome you to Royal Maxim Palace Kempinski, a haven of tranquillity in the heart of New Cairo. Offering a range of palatial services, the 5 star hotel features the finest facilities coupled with the highest levels of service. The hotel’s optimum location on the city’s ring road and its close proximity to Cairo International Airport make it the perfect starting point from which to explore Cairo’s treasures. With a distinctive architecture standing proudly against the New Cairo skyline, each of the 245 rooms and suites present comfortable and elegant fittings and furnishings. Enhance your stay with a visit to one of our eight exceptional restaurants & bars, or treat yourself to a rejuvenating treatment at our world-class Resense Spa. The unique architecture of New Cairo’s palatial landmark extends to our dedicated banquet floor, which includes 11 customisable meeting rooms and the largest ballroom in Egypt, Excelsior Ballroom.

location: Nile City Towers - 2005 B, Corniche El Nil Ramlet Beaulac, Cairo 2466 Egypt
Description: A melting pot of history and diversity, the city of Cairo is ideal for both business and leisure. Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair. With sweeping panoramas of the river Nile and the Pyramids in the distance, Cairo’s beauty and history are always in sight from your luxury accommodation. During your stay, embark on culinary adventures at the city’s finest restaurants, enjoy the fresh air at our rooftop poolside restaurant and pamper yourself at Willow Stream Spa. Part of the prestigious Nile City complex, this luxury hotel is the perfect location for business events. The space consists of 845 square meters (9,100 square feet) plus 450 square meters (4,800 square feet) of outdoor space dedicated to meetings and conventions, comprising of 10 meeting rooms including a ballroom. The space also offers spectacular river Nile views.

location: 3 Cairo International Airport, Terminal Cairo International Airport, Terminal 3, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Your Gateway to Egypt's Discovery. Le Méridien Cairo Airport offers 66 club floor rooms with a dedicated club lounge, 264 deluxe rooms, 9 studio suites, 9 panoramic deluxe suites and 1 presidential suite - all inside of Cairo's airport. All rooms and suites are fully soundproofed, smoke-free, and feature the Le Méridien signature beds. The refined and modern design creates a perfectly relaxed experience. A combination of complimentary WIFI + cable connection coupled with the latest technology makes it easy to conduct business if necessary.

location: Nile City Towers - 2005 B, Corniche El Nil Ramlet Beaulac, Cairo 2466 Egypt
Description: A melting pot of history and diversity, the city of Cairo is ideal for both business and leisure. Like the city itself, Fairmont Nile City offers a delightful series of contrasts, combining advanced technology and modern design with local flavors and flair. With sweeping panoramas of the river Nile and the Pyramids in the distance, Cairo’s beauty and history are always in sight from your luxury accommodation. During your stay, embark on culinary adventures at the city’s finest restaurants, enjoy the fresh air at our rooftop poolside restaurant and pamper yourself at Willow Stream Spa. Part of the prestigious Nile City complex, this luxury hotel is the perfect location for business events. The space consists of 845 square meters (9,100 square feet) plus 450 square meters (4,800 square feet) of outdoor space dedicated to meetings and conventions, comprising of 10 meeting rooms including a ballroom. The space also offers spectacular river Nile views.

location: Corniche El Nile Garden City, Roda Island, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: A haven within the cosmopolitan vibrant city of Cairo.One of Cairo's most luxurious hotels,Grand Nile Tower is a family hotel directly situated on the magnificent Nile river with a prime location in central Cairo,close to many cultural and tourist 's attractions.This stunning Kid-friendly Hotel offers you the finest service and experiences,elegantly designed accommodation that includes a wide selection of room types all of them are overlooking the splendid Nile River.The rooms and suites are having balconies with spectacular Nile views. A wide array of cuisines at any of our eight restaurants and lounges,including the highly acclaimed Revolving restaurant at the 41st floor .The restaurant is the highest rotating restaurant in the Middle East .As a guest,you can also access the exquisite conference and banqueting facilities for hosting memorable social and corporate events.

location: Cairo 11776 Egypt
Description: Touch down in 4-star comfort at Novotel Cairo Airport hotel, a 5-minute ride from the terminals on the free 24-hour shuttle. Relax under the palms in the courtyard, or re-energise with a dip in the pool. All-day dining means you won't fly hungry. Your modern soundproofed room lets you stretch out and enjoy a restful night at Novotel.

location: Corniche El Nile 1115, Cairo 12344 Egypt
Description: Finding an ideal luxury hotel in Cairo does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Ramses Hilton, a nice option for travellers like you.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Zamalek (Gezira Island) (0.5 mi) and Mosque of Al-Azhar (0.9 mi), guests of Ramses Hilton can easily experience some of Cairo's most well known attractions.Ramses Hilton Hotel is a luxury hotel offering a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.The hotel features room service, a rooftop terrace, and a concierge. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travellers visiting Cairo. For guests with a vehicle, parking is available.While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the diners, including Kamala at Conrad Cairo, Bikers' Joint, and 3Almashy Egypt, all of which are a short distance from Ramses Hilton.Cairo is also home to Military Museum, a popular military museum that is not too far from Ramses Hilton.Ramses Hilton looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Cairo.

location: El-Orouba Qism El-Nozha, Cairo 2466 Egypt
Description: Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Cairo does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hilton Cairo Heliopolis, a nice option for travelers like you. While staying at Hilton Cairo Heliopolis, visitors can check out Baron Palace (2.1 mi) and St. Mark's Coptic Orthodox Church (2.3 mi), some of Cairo's top attractions. You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as Hilton Cairo Heliopolis offers guests free Wi-Fi. The hotel features room service and a concierge. Plus, Hilton Cairo Heliopolis offers a pool, and providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. During your stay enjoy variety of international cuisines such as Raj Indian Restaurant, Leonardo Italian restaurant, Lan-Tania Thai Restaurant, Nobel house Asian restaurant and Al-Dabke Lebanese restaurant. While in Cairo be sure to experience nearby popular attractions like Egyptian Air Force Museum (0.9 mi) and Obelisk of Ramses II (1.2 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel. Hilton Cairo Heliopolis looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Cairo. NOTE: The following services and amenities are available, but with reduced service: Business Center, Fitness Center, On-site Restaurant(s).

location: 26 Mahmoud Bassiouny Rooftop, 7th Floor, Talat Harb Sq, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Dahab Hostel, Your Oasis in the City... It has been open since 1998. It has been registered in all the major guidebooks and has consistently received positive reviews. Dabab Hostel is centrally located in the heart of Downtown Cairo. It is just a 3-minute-walking distance to the Egyptian Museum in Tahrir Sq., and within easy reach to the main train and bus stations. Dabab Hostel has its own special charm. It is a collection of whitewashed huts on the rooftop attempting to recreate the feel of Sinai beach camp in an unremittingly urban Downtown Cairo. Once you get inside, you will definitely sense the totally laid-back, chilled out and cozy atmosphere. The outdoor garden area is just superb for lounging around and catching up with other travelers in the evening. The breeze is refreshing and the vibe is incontestable. It is an ideal place for artistic travellers as well. Enjoy the fantastic reggae music played, laying back in the sun, smoking Shisha 'Water pipe' on the rooftop at the Bedwin corner. Sit back & relax, plan your itineraries & catch up with your family & friends by logging onto our new optimized FREE WiFi Broadband Internet coverage for the entire hostel. Our rooms are equipped withprivate facilities and A/C. We have single, double and private dorms available and there are 39 rooms in total. Airport Pickup Service Once you have made your booking, you will be contacted by a staff member to organize it with you. At the airport, you will find our representative waiting for you holding a sign of your name and Dahab hostel, after you finish passport checking and custom clearance. Things to see in the local area Shopping Bazars. Khan El-Khalili Market. Al Azhar Mosque. Old Cairo /Islamic Cairo. Coptic Area. The Citadel. Cairo Tower. Cairo Opera House. In the evenings, the local area has a wide variety of restaurants and lively nightspots. Thank you for choosing Dahab Hostel ... See you soon in Cairo... ...::: NEW :::... Check out our new Deluxe rooms with private facilities and A/C

location: Ring Road- Mirage City Heliopolis, Cairo 11757 Egypt
Description: Treat yourself to a new standard of elegance at the award-winning JW Marriott Hotel Cairo. Set against the unique and magical backdrop of Cairo, Egypt, a vibrant city steeped in 7,000 years of history and culture, our luxury hotel provides a combination of relaxed sophistication and personalized service. 440 impeccably appointed hotel rooms and suites offer every luxury for your Heliopolis visit, from pillowtop mattresses and marble bathrooms to 24-hour room service and high-speed Internet. Our stunning suites feature impressive views of our golf course, or "The Beach." With 12 diverse dining options at your disposal, you can rest assured that your appetite will always be satisfied. Indulge in a luxury treatment at the 27,000-square foot Mandara Spa, or play a round at our Mirage City Golf Club. Plan your next event with us in Heliopolis; our hotel features gorgeous, flexible venue space and comprehensive planning services. For the getaway of a lifetime here in Egypt, choose the JW Marriott Hotel Cairo.

location: 3 Saraya El Gezira Street Zamalek, Cairo Egypt
Description: Looking for a place to stay in Cairo? Then look no further than Novotel Cairo El Borg, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Cairo to your doorstep.Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and Novotel Cairo El Borg Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including room service, a rooftop terrace, and a concierge. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Cairo, Novotel Cairo El Borg Hotel is located a short distance from Zamalek (Gezira Island) (0.0 mi) and Mosque of Al-Azhar (1.1 mi).While you’re here, be sure to check out some of the Italian restaurants, including Vivo Restaurant, Pane Vino Restaurant, and L'Uliveto Restaurant, all of which are a short distance from Novotel Cairo El Borg.Cairo is also home to Egyptian Geology Museum, a popular science museum that is not too far from Novotel Cairo El Borg Hotel.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Novotel Cairo El Borg as you experience everything Cairo has to offer.

Hotel Names: 20. The St. Regis Almasa Hotel, Cairo
location: Cairo Suez Road New Administrative Capital, Cairo 29115 Egypt
Description: Located in the heart of the new administrative capital, The St. Regis Almasa Hotel serves as a destination within a destination. It is the prestigious address perfectly situated to enhance the networks of state officials and the business elite as well as an exquisite escape for unparalleled family time. Here, quintessential luxury meets stately elegance. On the fast track to becoming Egypt’s epicenter of governance and commerce, the new administrative capital will play host to heads of state and their delegations, while acting as the seat of power for the country’s government. Featuring a vibrant new center of arts and culture, the capital will also attract artists and art lovers to enchanting and inspiring destinations like the stunning Grand Opera House. Also, not far off are one of the world’s most iconic ancient wonders - the pyramids.

Hotel Names: 21. Concorde El Salam Hotel Cairo by Royal Tulip
location: 69 Abdel Hamid Badawi Street, Heliopolis, Cairo 5614 Egypt
Description: Located in the fashionable suburb of Heliopolis, 10 minutes from Cairo International airport, 10 minutes from the Cairo International Conference center and 25 minutes from the city center with courtesy hotel shuttle. Georgian style hotel of architecture boasting all leisure facilities including tennis courts, glazed squash courts, equestrian club & business center. 320 spacious rooms with 18 suites and 14 individual pool side rooms, Executive floor including business advantage rooms, Executive lounge and butler service. All rooms & public areas have broadband internet access with free WiFi technology, IP telephone with voice mail, data port. All rooms with 32-Inch LCD TV. 11 fully equipped meeting rooms accommodating up to 500 people. All rooms feature the latest audiovisual equipment, fax and computer facilities. Fitness & Health Club fully equipped with cardiovascular equipment for total body workouts. The Spa sauna, Jacuzzi , hammam and professional massage.

location: 1 Talaat Harb Square, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Hotel Grand Royal is located in Cairo City Centre. Rooms are decorated with white colours and wooden furniture. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel. The rooms are air-conditioned with wooden flooring. Facilities include TV and bathroom with a bathtub. Some rooms have a balcony overlooking the city. Fresh flowers are sent to the rooms every day. Guests can enjoy the wide variety of restaurants located outside the hotel. Choice of food ranges from Egyptian to western dishes. The restaurant at Grand Royal is also open to guests, and room service is available as well. Guests can take a walk by the Nile River or visit the Egyptian Museum, all within 15 minutes' walking distance. The hotel is within 20 minutes' drive to Pyramids of Giza. Cairo International Airport is located within 35 minutes' driving distance.

location: 14 Al Baroon El-Montaza, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Hilltop Hotel located in business center of Heliopolis overlooking the famous Baron Empain Palace.

location: 49 Nubar Bab el Louk, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: The Hotel Osiris was recently built with a unique oriental inspired style, giving this place a special charm and cosy atmosphere, making you feel at home. Clean, quiet rooms, comfortable beds, air conditioning, internet cafe. Outstanding Top Roof terrace with a panoramic view of Cairo and delicious homemade Egyptian food. Managed by Josiane & Nabil, French & Egyptian, English speakers - the Hotel is strategically located in the heart of down town Cairo, by the metro & Egyptian Museum.

location: 11 Ramsis Street, Abdelmonem Riyadh Square 5th Floor downtown-Cairo, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Situated in Cairo, Cairo Governorate region, Oasis Downtown Hostel is set 1 km from Tahrir Square. Located around 1 km from The Egyptian Museum, the hostel is also 2.4 km away from Khan Al Khalili. The accommodation offers free WiFi. At the hostel, the rooms are equipped with a terrace. At Elwahaa Downtown Hostel, all rooms include air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A continental breakfast is served each morning at the property. Speaking Arabic and German, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Al-Azhar Mosque is 2.9 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 19 km from Elwahaa Downtown Hostel.

Hotel Names: InterContinental Citystars Cairo, an IHG Hotel
location: Omar Ibn El Khattab Street Heliopolis, Cairo 11737 Egypt
Description: Explore Cairo's heritage amidst modern luxuries and stay at the five-star InterContinental Citystars Cairo hotel in Cairo's Heliopolis, next to Stars Centre Mall. Relax in grand rooms with beautiful furnishings and views. Indulge at our 10 exquisite restaurants and bars. Need event space? Our private meeting rooms and Egypt's largest ballroom will satisfy your requirements. Our concierge gladly arranges private tours of the nearby Cairo Citadel, the Pyramids, and soon, The Grand Egyptian Museum.

location: 41 Sherif Street, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Situated in the heart of Cairo, we offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a balcony. 24-hour front desk, which provides car rentals and a shuttle. The Egyptian Museum is a 10-minute walk away.The spacious rooms at Cairo Paradise Hotel come with a private or shared bathroom. All have a satellite TV and Satellite . Each features an individual decor and is fitted with heating and wooden floors.A continental fresh breakfast,is served daily for the guests.At the tour desk, guests can get information about things to see and do in Cairo. Nasser Metro Station and Ramses Train Station are within a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

location: 18 B 26 of July St, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Paradise Boutique Hotel is 2 star Hotel. located in Downtown Cairo.just a short 10 minutes walk from Tahrir Square. at the most vivid spot in Cairo, where you are surrounded by the most important squares, shops, restaurants, ATM's and Banks. Paradise Boutique Hotel Guests enjoy free WiFi connection throughout the hotel. Welcome to our Hotel

location: 1 El Bostan St. Downtown, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: City View Hotel is located in the heart of the City within walking distance to the marvelous Egyptian Museum and the hotel offers its hospitality to both business and vacation ravelers for our facilities and services have been designed to meet the expectations of our discerning guest. City View Hotel is located in Tahrir Square (Revolution Square) exactly in the shadow of the magnificent Egyptian Museum and it offers you a complete range of services that will help make your stay a pleasant and memorable one. The unique location of City View Hotel is helping you to find easily a variety of restaurants, banks, embassies and metro are all within walking distance.

Hotel Names: 29. Golden Tulip Flamenco Hotel Flamenco Cairo
location: 2 El Gezira El Wosta Street Zamalek, Cairo 11511 Egypt
Description: Golden Tulip Flamenco is an excellent choice for travellers visiting Cairo, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.Cairo Golden Tulip features room service and a concierge. In addition, as a valued Golden Tulip Flamenco guest, you can enjoy free breakfast that is available on-site.Close to some of Cairo's most popular landmarks, such as Cairo Tower (1.5 mi) and Zamalek (Gezira Island) (1.6 mi), Golden Tulip Flamenco is a great destination for tourists.Travellers looking to enjoy some shrimp can head to Kadoura Fish Restaurant, Birdcage, or Abou el-Sid. Otherwise, you may want to check out a French restaurant such as The Revolving Restaurant, Le Deck, or The Grill Restaurant & Lounge.Cairo is also home to Egyptian Geology Museum, a popular science museum that is not too far from Cairo Golden Tulip.Enjoy your stay in Cairo!

location: Omar Ibn El Khattab Street, Masaken Al Mohandesin City Stars Area, Cairo 02544 Egypt
Description: Tolip Golden Plaza Hotel is conveniently located in the heart of Heliopolis, the notorious elegant residential and commercial area. The hotel is set 8km from Cairo International Airport, 12 km from the down town Cairo and just few minutes away from The Cairo International Convention Centre. The hotel also enjoys easy access to some of Egypt best shopping malls; it is at a 2-minute walk from City Stars Mall and at a 10-minute drive from Cairo Festival City Mall.

Hotel Names: Holiday Inn Cairo - Citystars, an IHG Hotel
location: Ali Rashed Street Heliopolis, Cairo 11757 Egypt
Description: A modern, family-friendly hotel in Cairo's dynamic Citystars Heliopolis In the heart of Citystars business and leisure complex and just 10 minutes from Cairo International Airport, the Holiday Inn® Cairo Citystars hotel is an ideal base for exploring the modern and historic attractions of Egypt's capital. Next to the hotel, Stars Centre Mall is home to over 640 of shops and high-tech amusements including Snow City and Magic Galaxy, Egypt's largest indoor theme park. Downtown Cairo is less than half an hour away. The hotel's family-friendly atmosphere makes everyone feel at home, from the rooftop garden with its adults' and children's swimming pools, to the Star Corner Café in the lobby. Open 24-hours, Windows Restaurant tempts diners with heaped international buffets and live cooking stations, and Indira Restaurant serves some of the best Indian food in Cairo. Business travelers appreciate the fast, free Wi-Fi, business center and 24-hour room service. Need to hold a meeting?
